item.title: Katerina Ristorante Italiano to Open in Great Neck
item.description:
Katerina Ristorante Italiano to Open in Great Neck

Feb. 26, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- New York City Restaurateurs Antonio Cerra and Executive Chef Alberto Argudo bring more than 50 years of experience in the hospitality industry in are now taking their talents to , to provide guests modern Italian Cuisine. They are joined by 1st time Restaurateur Kathy "Katerina" Cerra!

item.title: Gott's Roadside opening in Walnut Creek
item.description:
Gott's Roadside opening in Walnut Creek

Gott's Roadside Diner is opening its first East Bay location in downtown Walnut Creek. The wildly popular restaurant is known for its updated take on classic Americana roadside fare, including burgers made with natural Niman Ranch meat, sweet potato fries, and organic ice cream shakes, as well as ahi fish tacos, salads, craft beer, and robust selection of Napa Valley wines-the original restaurant opened in St.

item.title: Khachapuri Is The Best Drunk Food You've Never Heard Of
item.description:
Khachapuri Is The Best Drunk Food You've Never Heard Of

In the nation of Georgia, one dish is such a staple of the cuisine that its price is used to track inflation from region to region. It's called khachapuri, and it is an eggy, cheesy, bready miracle. To learn more about the dish, the Eater team visited Oda House, a traditional Georgian restaurant in New York's East Village.

item.title: No title
2012 Castello di Uzzano Chianti Classico
item.description:
2012 Castello di Uzzano Chianti Classico

I always enjoy buying Chianti Classicos at Costco because the prices are hard to beat, they are typically in the $13-19 range and the wines usually taste great. This is a DOCG bottle that I found for $13.99.

item.title: Jean-Charles Boisset Brings His Inimitable Style to Yountville
item.description:
Jean-Charles Boisset Brings His Inimitable Style to Yountville

Yountville, known as the Napa Valley's culinary capital, already boasted some of the best restaurant in the region. Now, it also has the hautest new spot, make that spots, with flamboyant Frenchman Jean-Charles Boisset's new JCB Tasting Salon, a wine tasting and luxury lifestyle retail destination, and Atelier by JCB, a gourmet Ã©picerie that offers a curated assortment of gourmet culinary delights.

item.title: No title
Prosecco Gets Serious About Quality
item.description:
Prosecco Gets Serious About Quality

"These are the most beautiful vineyards I've ever seen. And, I've seen a lot of vineyards," I kept repeating as I visited the captivating hills of Valdobbiadene and Conegliano. I wasn't surprised to learn this nook of the Veneto is petitioning to be recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage site.

item.title: Sonoma Valley Vintners & Growers " VINOLIVO Weekend
item.description:
Sonoma Valley Vintners & Growers " VINOLIVO Weekend

This weekend long affair kicks off in style with not-to-be-missed Grand Tasting event on Friday evening. The festivities continue on Saturday and Sunday when some 40 wineries welcome ticket holders with exclusive VINOLIVO offers and experiences. Intimate winemaker dinners round out the evening schedule offering a deeper exploration into the delights of food and wine pairing.
